amendment.description: Amendment authorizes the Energy Innovation Hubs Program within the Department of Energy.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 9 printed in part A of House Report 114-120 to authorize the Energy Innovation Hubs Program within the Department of Energy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Grayson.
